articles.title: Orbiting astronaut oversees robot team on Earth - European Space Agency
articles.description: Astronaut Frank Rubio aboard the International Space Station collaborated with a small team of robots on Earth to accomplish a complex task – a first test of a new approach to combine human and robotic capabilities for our return to the Moon and beyond.
